item.title: gwern.net GPT-2
item.description: original article https://www.gwern.net/GPT-2 Read using eww The website when viewed with a GUI browser, although impressive, is distracting. The website was built with hackyll, a static site generator employing haskell. 1 eww "https://www.gwern.net/GPT-2" Ease of reading Straight-forward once you understand ML jargon.
